name: Red Polka Dot Rockabilly Swing Dress
description:
Red Hot Polka Dot Full Circle 50s Style Dress

This stunning rockabilly dress has a lined well fitted bustier strapless top.

Beautiful  retro red and white polka dot fabric

The full circle skirt is 27" inches long from the waist to the hem.The full dress is approximatly 37" long from the bust to the hem has zip at back.

Wear it in different looks as a 1950s rockabilly dress with one of our 50s inspired petticoats .The full circle skirt makes it the perfect swing dress and the polka dots give it that authentic retro 50s pin up dress feel.

If you love vintage dresses you will dore this pin-up dress!

We have 27" Inch net petticoats available to purchase to go with your dress .

Dress can also be custom made to your actual bust and waist measurements for a perfect fit. Please refare to our sizing guide on how to measure yourself.

Be sure to check out Style Icons Closet Retro collection for more Vintage dresses , 50s Style dresses , swing dresses , Rockabilly dresses , Retro and Pin-up dresses!

The full circle skirt is 27" inches long from the waist to the hem.This rockabilly dress is approximately 37" long from the bust to the hem has zip at back.Wear it in different looks as a vintage inspired prom dress with one of our full circle crinoline petticoats, or as a 50s inspired dress with our round net petticoats.

The full circle skirt makes it the perfect Rockabilly dress and the polka dots give it that authentic retro dress feel.If you love vintage dresses you will adore this pin-up dress! 

We have 27" Inch net petticoats available to purchase to go with your dress and 50s /vintage inspired crinoline petticoats.

This gorgeous vintage inspired 50s party dress is guaranteed to get you noticed.

Little back dress has a 19" long full circle skirt which is perfect with one of our 50s inspired net petticoats giving it that authentic 50s vintage look.

name: Raw Silk Bustier Crop Top
description:
Luxurious 50s style pin up silk bustier in chic black color.

You can never go wrong with black, not only is it slimming but teamed with a silk fabric and corset style its guaranteed to make you stand out! 

Our vintage inspired crop top bustier has lacing at the back for a perfect fit. Lacing will give you a cinched waist corset look and pin up figure to die for!

Gorgeous vintage style sweetheart neckline! You can never go wrong with this pin up top!

Next Day Delivery Available On This Item If You Purchase It Before 3pm

name: Pin-Up Rock & Roll Rockabilly Full Circle Skirt
description:
Stunning Cotton Full circle skirt in retro polka dot pin up style.Full Circle Skirt has a zip at the back with a clasp and Oooses that Rockabilly 1950's Rock n' Roll Swing!

Can be worn with a petticoat for that 50s Glamorous look!The ribbon waist band gives it a sexy and yet playful look.Absolutely gorgeous!

Approximately 17" long

Has zip at the back

Matching petticoat available to purchase separate

Please allow 3 days for your item to be specially handmade!

name: African Tribal Print Full Circle Skirt
description:
Stunning tribal print 50s style full circle skirt. 

This stunning full circle skirt has a unique bright colored african print. The african tribal print design is set on acotton fabric with green , pink, yellow, black and dark blue bold colors which make the skirt a really unique gem!

Has zip at the back . The pink ribbon waist band gives it a pin-up playful look . Absolutely gorgeous! . Skirt is Approximatly 17.5" long and is made of a light and flowy cotton fabric. .

Can be worn with a petticoat for a more authentic 50s look.
